Lifelink
Nourish 1 [i](When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a colorless Food artifact token with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
notes:
New(ish) card — replaced Mesa Unicorn

Gives the card more flexibility and relevance to virtually every white-based archetype. Also gives white a beast just-in-case for gruul synergy.
